New Records: Detroit Tigers were eliminated from the playoffs with a 7-3 loss in Game 5 of the ALDS against the Cleveland Guardians on October 12, 2024
Key Match Events: Fry's 2-run homer and squeeze bunt led the Guardians to a win, forcing Game 5
The Tigers blanked the Guardians with clutch hitting and strong pitching to take the series lead
Pre-Game Insights: Tigers fans set a postseason game attendance record at Comerica Park
The series between the Tigers and Guardians was highly anticipated as they met in October's postseason for the first time
Post-Match Reflections: Tigers fans expressed sadness but optimism after the loss
The Tigers' victory in Game 4 was described as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was moved up due to weather
A 99-year-old Tigers fan hoped to witness the team's 5th World Series win
